inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: diagnosis with Paget's disease of bone

inclusion.criterion: planned to receive multiagent chemotherapeutic regimen for 6 cycles
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: BMD T-score between -2.5 and 0 at any site
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: medication, excessive alcohol intake, or GI disease inhibiting GI absorption
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: metabolic bone disease, bony metastases, poorly controlled thyroid or parathyroid conditions, Paget's disease, or on hormonal therapy/other treatments for OP
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: abnormalities of the esophagus which delay esophageal emptying i.e., achalasia
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: inability to stand or sit upright for at least 30 minutes
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: patient is able to stand and sit upright

exclusion.criterion: hypersensitivity to any component of the drug product
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Paget's disease of bone, which meets several inclusion criteria. The patient is also postmenopausal and has primary ovarian cancer, which further supports eligibility.
